title: Better Artificial Intelligence Stock: Palantir Technologies vs. IBM
description: Palantir Technologies and International Business Machines are seeing strong demand for their AI-powered enterprise applications, with Palantir's growth outpacing IBM's. However, Palantir's stock is considered too expensive, while IBM offers better value and a dividend.
keywords: Palantir Technologies,International Business Machines,AI,enterprise applications,stock valuation

title: Should You Forget C3.ai and Buy These 2 AI Stocks Instead?
description: C3.ai's stock has fallen below its IPO price due to cooling growth, steep losses, and rising interest rates. Instead of investing in C3.ai, investors should consider Micron and IBM, which are better positioned to benefit from the growing AI market.

title: Is IBM Stock a Buy?
description: IBM's new AI platform, watsonx, has generated $3 billion in orders in just six quarters, but the stock has only gained 45% in the past year, trailing AI peers like Nvidia and Palantir. IBM's focus on enterprise clients and consulting services gives it a unique advantage, and the stock looks undervalued compared to its AI-focused competitors.

title: Recruitment Process Outsourcing Market to Witness 16.1% CAGR by 2031 | SkyQuest Technology

title: Cloud Backup Market to exceed $31.4 Bn by 2032, Says Global Market Insights Inc.
description: The global cloud backup market is predicted to reach $31.4 billion by 2032, driven by the rising threat of cyberattacks and data breaches. Large enterprises hold over 65% of the market share, as they require scalable cloud backup to manage vast amounts of data.
